r.s: A utility to convert some types of errors to exceptions
r.d:
Stagehand_LegacyError is a package that can be used to convert some types of errors to exceptions automatically. The following types of errors are supported:
* PEAR_Error * PEAR_ErrorStack * PHP errors which can be processed by a user-defined error handler
Auto conversion can be enabled for each type of errors. If auto conversion is enabled, an error will be converted to an exception by the appropriate error handler when the error is raised. And also exception objects raised by conversion are instances of a class which implements the Stagehand_LegacyError_Exception interface.
r.n:
What's New in Stagehand_LegacyError 0.3.1
Two defect fixes.
* A defect has been fixed so that Stagehand_LegacyError_PHPError causes an exception to be raised when an unrelated error is raised. * A defect has been fixed so that Stagehand_LegacyError_PEARErrorStack causes a "Strict Standards" error to be raised.
